name: Evil Doll
storyline:
Your journey begins with curiosity. You and a friend ventured into the house, dismissing the chilling stories of the Evil Doll as mere legend. Now, you must navigate through the eerie, dark environment filled with notes that reveal the lore and origins of the Evil Doll.

To survive, you must solve puzzles scattered throughout the house. These puzzles will lead you closer to your escape but be wary of making noise. Dropping items can alert the Evil Doll to your location if it’s nearby. The doll is always watching, always listening. You can run, hide under beds or in closets, but if the Evil Doll sees you, it will kill you.

The house is filled with various weapons that you can use to defend yourself, but they will only buy you a little time. The Evil Doll will always come back, more determined than ever.
summary: Evil Doll is a survival horror game, where you find yourself trapped in an abandoned house with a demonic-looking doll. With five days to escape, you must solve puzzles while evading the murderous Evil Doll. Will you survive?
